NullBehavior Class Reference

List of all members.

Public Member Functions

 setup (&$model, $fields=array())
 beforeSave (&$model)

Detailed Description

Replaces empty strings, '', with null values before committing them to the database.

Copyright 2013 University of Washington, School of Nursing. http://opensource.org/licenses/BSD-3-Clause

SAMPLE USAGE: var $actsAs = array('Null' => array('gender', 'city', 'country')); reference: http://bakery.cakephp.org/articles/view/null-behavior

Member Function Documentation

NullBehavior::setup ( &$  model,
$  fields = array() 
)

Initializes the fields to which this behavior applies.

NullBehavior::beforeSave ( &$  model  ) 

For the appropriate fields, convert empty strings to null values before saving the data.
